revised_title: Electromagnetic Waves in Anisotropic Media: A Bivector Approach
tldr: This article explores the propagation of electromagnetic plane waves in anisotropic media using bivectors. Both homogeneous and inhomogeneous plane waves are considered, with a focus on the effects of electrical and magnetic anisotropy on wave behavior. The study provides a geometrical interpretation of wave properties using bivectors and their associated directional ellipses.
